games.name: The Crew
games.description: A racing game set in a persistent open world recreation of the contiguous United States, featuring both role-playing and large-scale multiplayer elements.

games.description: Modern-era military FPS that redefined the series with intense combat and cinematic storytelling.

games.name: Call of Duty: World at War
games.description: Return to WWII with brutal Pacific and Eastern Front battles.

games.name: Call of Duty: NX1 (Future Warfare)
games.description: A leaked prototype of an unreleased Call of Duty title, codenamed 'NX1' or 'Future Warfare', for Xbox and PC.

games.name: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 2
games.description: Sequel to Modern Warfare, delivering intense cinematic missions.

games.name: Call of Duty: Black Ops
games.description: Cold War-era shooter blending covert operations with explosive missions.

games.name: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 3
games.description: Global conflict reaches its climax in the Modern Warfare trilogy.

games.name: Call of Duty: Black Ops II
games.description: Branching storylines and futuristic tech in a Cold War sequel.

games.name: Call of Duty: Ghosts
games.description: Post-apocalyptic warfare with a new squad system.

games.name: Call of Duty: Advanced Warfare
games.description: Futuristic shooter introducing exosuits and high-tech weaponry.

games.name: Call of Duty: Black Ops III
games.description: Cybernetic soldiers and futuristic warfare in a high-tech world.

games.name: Call of Duty: Infinite Warfare
games.description: Interplanetary warfare with a cinematic singleplayer campaign.

games.name: Call of Duty: WWII

games.description: Cold War espionage and covert missions with multiplayer and zombies modes.

games.description: WWII shooter exploring multiple theaters of war.

games.description: The sequel to the 2019 reboot, continuing the story with updated graphics and gameplay.

games.name: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare III
games.description: The latest entry in the Modern Warfare series, featuring a new campaign, multiplayer, and zombies mode.

games.name: Call of Duty: Black Ops 6
games.description: The latest entry in the Black Ops series, featuring next-gen visuals and gripping action.

games.name: Grand Theft Auto V
games.description: A crime-action game with three protagonists, set in the state of San Andreas.

games.description: An action-adventure game with a new protagonist, Niko Bellic, set in a reimagined Liberty City.

games.name: Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas
games.description: A crime-action game following Carl "CJ" Johnson in the fictional state of San Andreas.

games.name: Need for Speed: ProStreet
games.description: A racing game focused on legal street racing events in closed courses, featuring realistic car damage and physics.

games.name: Need for Speed: Underground
games.description: A racing game that redefined the series with a focus on street racing and car customization.

games.name: Need for Speed: Undercover
games.description: An open-world racing game with a storyline focused on infiltrating a criminal syndicate.

games.name: Need for Speed: The Run
games.description: A cross-country race with cinematic action sequences and quick-time events.

games.name: Need for Speed: Rivals Complete Edition
games.description: A racing game set in an open world, featuring high-stakes chases between racers and police.

games.name: Need for Speed: Hot Pursuit (2010)
games.description: A high-speed racing game focusing on intense police chases and exotic cars.

games.name: Need for Speed: Porsche Unleashed
games.description: A racing game dedicated to the Porsche brand, covering a wide range of models and historical periods.

games.name: Need for Speed: Shift
games.description: A racing simulator that focuses on the experience of being in the cockpit of a high-performance car.

games.name: Need for Speed: Carbon
games.description: A racing game featuring canyon races and crew management, set in the city of Palmont.

games.name: Need for Speed: Payback
games.description: An open-world racing game with a focus on heist missions and action-packed sequences.

games.description: A classic street racing game with police chases and a blacklist of rival racers to defeat.

games.name: Need for Speed: Most Wanted (2012) Limited Edition
games.description: An open-world racing game with a focus on competitive multiplayer and social features.

games.name: Need for Speed: Underground 2
games.description: The sequel to Need for Speed Underground, featuring a larger open world and more extensive car customization.

games.name: Assassin's Creed Chronicles Trilogy
games.description: A series of 2.5D side-scrolling stealth games.

games.name: Assassin's Creed III Remastered
games.description: A remastered version of the game set during the American Revolution.

games.name: Assassin's Creed Mirage
games.description: A modern return to the series' stealth-focused roots, set in 9th-century Baghdad.

games.name: Assassin's Creed Rogue
games.description: A game where players control a former Assassin who joins the Templars, featuring naval gameplay.

games.name: Assassin's Creed Syndicate Gold Edition
games.description: An action-adventure game set in Victorian-era London, with a focus on twin protagonists.

games.name: Assassin's Creed III
games.description: The original game set during the American Revolution, introducing a new protagonist and setting.

games.name: Assassin's Creed Origins Gold Edition
games.description: An action RPG set in ancient Egypt, exploring the origins of the Assassin Brotherhood.

games.name: Assassin's Creed Unity
games.description: A game set during the French Revolution, featuring cooperative multiplayer.

games.name: Assassin's Creed Brotherhood
games.description: The sequel to Assassin's Creed II, where Ezio Auditore rebuilds the Assassin Brotherhood in Rome.

games.name: Assassin's Creed IV: Black Flag
games.description: A game combining the Assassin's Creed series with a pirate setting, featuring extensive naval exploration.

games.name: Assassin's Creed
games.description: The first game in the series, introducing the Assassin Altaïr Ibn-La'Ahad.

games.name: Assassin's Creed Revelations
games.description: The final chapter in the Ezio Auditore and Altaïr Ibn-La'Ahad trilogies.

games.name: Assassin's Creed II
games.description: The sequel to the original, introducing the protagonist Ezio Auditore.

games.name: Assassin's Creed Valhalla
games.description: An action RPG set in the Viking Age, where players take on the role of a Viking raider.

games.name: Assassin's Creed Odyssey
games.description: An action RPG set in ancient Greece during the Peloponnesian War.

games.name: Metal Gear Solid Delta: Snake Eater
games.description: A full, enhanced remake of the classic tactical espionage action game Metal Gear Solid 3, with updated graphics and modern controls.

games.name: Metal Gear Solid 3: Snake Eater
games.description: The original game from 2004, a prequel to the Metal Gear series that explores the origin story of Big Boss.

games.name: Metal Gear Solid 2: Sons of Liberty
games.description: A sequel to the original Metal Gear Solid, featuring new protagonist Raiden and a complex plot involving virtual reality and conspiracies.

games.name: Metal Gear Solid: Master Collection Vol. 1
games.description: A compilation of classic Metal Gear titles, including Metal Gear Solid 1, 2, and 3, along with other bonus content.

games.name: Metal Gear Solid V: Ground Zeroes
games.description: A prologue to The Phantom Pain, serving as an introduction to the new open-world gameplay style and narrative.

games.name: Metal Gear Solid V: The Phantom Pain
games.description: A massive open-world stealth-action game following the events of Ground Zeroes, with a focus on freedom of approach and tactical espionage.

games.name: Metal Gear Rising: Revengeance
games.description: A fast-paced, action-oriented spin-off of the Metal Gear series, focusing on high-speed sword combat as the cyborg ninja Raiden.

games.name: Forza Motorsport 2
games.description: A racing simulation game.

games.name: Forza Motorsport 3
games.description: A racing simulation game with a focus on track racing and car collection.

games.name: Forza Motorsport 4
games.description: A racing simulation game with new features like the Autovista mode and a large selection of cars.

games.name: Forza Horizon (1)
games.description: The first open-world racing game in the Horizon spin-off series, featuring a music festival theme.

games.name: Forza Horizon 2
games.description: An open-world racing game set in Southern Europe, with dynamic weather and a day-night cycle.

games.name: Forza Horizon 2 Presents Fast And Furious
games.description: A standalone expansion to Forza Horizon 2 themed around the Fast & Furious film series.

games.name: Forza Horizon 3
games.description: An open-world racing game set in Australia, with a wide variety of biomes and a focus on festival management.

games.name: Forza Horizon 4
games.description: An open-world racing game set in a fictionalized Great Britain, featuring dynamic seasons.

games.name: Forza Motorsport 6 Apex
games.description: A free-to-play racing game for Windows 10, a slimmed-down version of Forza Motorsport 6.

games.name: Forza Motorsport 7
games.description: A racing simulation game with an extensive collection of cars and tracks, and a focus on motorsport racing.

games.name: Gran Turismo 1
games.description: The groundbreaking racing simulation that set new standards for realism and depth on the PlayStation.

games.name: Gran Turismo 2
games.description: Expanded on the original with more cars, tracks, and deeper customization, a must-play for racing enthusiasts.

games.name: Gran Turismo 3 - A Spec
games.description: A pivotal entry in the series, leveraging the power of PlayStation 2 for enhanced graphics and physics.

games.name: Gran Turismo 4
games.description: Known for its massive car list, detailed physics, and iconic Photo Mode, pushing PS2 capabilities.

games.name: Gran Turismo HD Concept
games.description: A tech demo for the PlayStation 3, showcasing the series' graphical potential in high definition.

games.name: Gran Turismo 5
games.description: The first main Gran Turismo title for PS3, featuring premium and standard cars, extensive online features, and stunning visuals.

games.name: Gran Turismo 6
games.description: Celebrating 15 years of Gran Turismo, this entry brought more cars, tracks, and a new physics engine to the PS3.
